message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

Alice, your initial offer of $20,000 is a bit too high for my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only afford to pay $12,000. I believe this is still a fair price considering my budget and the potential value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price represents a significant compromise and reflects the true value of this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $17,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. This is a fair price that balances my budget and the value of the product.
